testcase.name: User should be able to login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Scenario: User should be able to login with valid credentials # file:///F:/Trial/selenium_project/src/test/resources/features/Account.feature:3 Login page opened and iframe verified ✔ Given User is on the login page # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.AccountSteps.userIsOnTheLoginPage() Email and Password entered. ✔ When User enters email "ayerramilli@yahoo.com" and password "TestPassword@123" # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.AccountSteps.user_enters_email_and_password(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) ✔ And User clicks the login button # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.AccountSteps.userClicksTheLoginButton() Redirected to 2-Step Verification Setup page. ✔ Then User should be redirected to setup 2-Step Verification after successful login # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.AccountSteps.userShouldBeRedirectedToSetup2StepVerificationAfterSuccessfulLogin()

testcase.name: User should not be able to login with invalid credentials #1
testcase.system-out: Scenario: User should not be able to login with invalid credentials # file:///F:/Trial/selenium_project/src/test/resources/features/Account.feature:17 Login page opened and iframe verified ✔ Given User is on the login page # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.AccountSteps.userIsOnTheLoginPage() Email and Password entered. ✔ When User enters email "user@test.com" and password "TestPassword@123@4443" # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.AccountSteps.user_enters_email_and_password(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) ✔ And User clicks the login button # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.AccountSteps.userClicksTheLoginButton() ✔ Then User should see an error message # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.AccountSteps.userShouldSeeAnErrorMessage()

testcase.name: User should not be able to login with invalid credentials #2
testcase.system-out: Scenario: User should not be able to login with invalid credentials # file:///F:/Trial/selenium_project/src/test/resources/features/Account.feature:18 Login page opened and iframe verified ✔ Given User is on the login page # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.AccountSteps.userIsOnTheLoginPage() Email and Password entered. ✔ When User enters email "invalid@yahoo.com" and password "wrongpassword@123" # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.AccountSteps.user_enters_email_and_password(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) ✔ And User clicks the login button # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.AccountSteps.userClicksTheLoginButton() ✔ Then User should see an error message # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.AccountSteps.userShouldSeeAnErrorMessage()

testcase.name: User should not be able to login with invalid credentials #3
testcase.system-out: Scenario: User should not be able to login with invalid credentials # file:///F:/Trial/selenium_project/src/test/resources/features/Account.feature:19 Login page opened and iframe verified ✔ Given User is on the login page # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.AccountSteps.userIsOnTheLoginPage() Email and Password entered. ✔ When User enters email "user@example.com" and password "incorrectpassword@345" # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.AccountSteps.user_enters_email_and_password(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) ✔ And User clicks the login button # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.AccountSteps.userClicksTheLoginButton() ✔ Then User should see an error message # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.AccountSteps.userShouldSeeAnErrorMessage()

testcase.name: User can select and send an E-Gift Card with verification
testcase.system-out: Scenario: User can select and send an E-Gift Card with verification # file:///F:/Trial/selenium_project/src/test/resources/features/GiftCard.feature:3 ✔ Given User opens the Cineplex homepage # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.GiftCardSteps.user_opens_cineplex_homepage() ✔ And User clicks on the Menu button # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.GiftCardSteps.user_clicks_on_menu_button() ✔ And User navigates to Gift Cards # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.GiftCardSteps.user_navigates_to_gift_cards() ✔ When User clicks Send an E-Gift Card # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.GiftCardSteps.user_clicks_send_e_gift_card() ✔ And User scrolls down the page a few times and back to top # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.GiftCardSteps.user_scrolls_down_and_back() ✔ And User enters "90" as the card value # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.GiftCardSteps.user_enters_card_value(java.lang.String) ✔ And User enters "7" as the quantity # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.GiftCardSteps.user_enters_quantity(java.lang.String) ✔ And User enters "Happy Birthday!" as the personal message # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.GiftCardSteps.user_enters_personal_message(java.lang.String) ✔ And User selects "Self deliver" as the delivery option # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.GiftCardSteps.user_selects_delivery_option(java.lang.String) ✔ And User enters "John Doe" as the recipient name # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.GiftCardSteps.user_enters_recipient_name(java.lang.String) ✔ And User clicks Add to cart to complete the selection # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.GiftCardSteps.user_clicks_add_to_cart() ✔ Then the gift cards should be added to the cart with the correct values # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.GiftCardSteps.the_gift_cards_should_be_added_to_cart_with_correct_values()

testcase.name: User views basic movie details #1
testcase.system-out: Scenario Outline: User views basic movie details # file:///F:/Trial/selenium_project/src/test/resources/features/Movie.feature:13 ✔ Given User opens the Cineplex homepage # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.GiftCardSteps.user_opens_cineplex_homepage() ✔ When User searches for "Relay" # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.MovieSteps.user_searches_for(java.lang.String) ✔ And User selects the movie "Relay" from the search results # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.MovieSteps.user_selects_movie_from_search_results(java.lang.String) ✔ Then Movie title should be displayed as "Relay" # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.MovieSteps.movie_title_should_be_displayed(java.lang.String) ✔ And The runtime should be visible as "1h 52min" # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.MovieSteps.the_runtime_should_be_visible(java.lang.String) ✔ And The genre should be visible as "Action, Thriller" # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.MovieSteps.the_genre_should_be_visible(java.lang.String) ✔ And The rating should be visible as "14A" # com.cineplex.stepdefinitions.MovieSteps.the_rating_should_be_visible(java.lang.String)
